0 Param data.1 string m_text: I'm sorry, Kagachi...
What for?
This never would have happened if I had my memories.
I doubt it would've made much of a difference.
I can't tell if you're trying to make me feel better, or just being a meanie.
Little bit of both.
You...you big dum-dum!
It's getting more powerful.
You may not get your wish at this rate.
Huh?
You want to save it, right?
Kagachi—
Don't worry, I'll still try. That's what Watchers do.
Thank you.
Where are you going?
To the dungeon beyond the mountains.
Not right now you ain't.
Why not?
Bossa's coming. Stay outta my way.
What's a "Bossa"?
Are you a friend of my father-in-law's?
No. I'm just trying to pass through the mountains.
Oh. He wouldn't let you, huh?
No. Mentioned something about a "Bossa"?
A Fallen Soul.
My father-in-law is obsessed with it.
And I'm supposed to just wait until he's had his fun with it? Not gonna happen. I've got somewhere I need to be.
I'll get rid of it myself, if it comes to that.
No, please. You have to let him do it!
That Fallen Soul is special. It... He...
He's my father-in-law's younger brother.
How do you know that?
He's the only one who can say for certain, but I'm positive he regrets what happened.
Which was?
There was a landslide, about five years past. His brother died, protecting him.
He was inconsolable. At some point, he says he started hearing this voice...
Said it was the voice of his younger brother.
Ever since then, he's devoted himself to defeating that Fallen. The one his brother became because of him.
Let him have this. Please.
Da! You gotta make the aegis flute!
Da's in the middle of a conversation right now. Wait over there until I'm done, yeah?
Sorry about that. We just lost their mother...
I'm sorry to hear that.
What's this aegis flute he was on about?
It's an instrument carved out of aegis wood. Its music was meant to accompany the dead on their journey Beyond.
People in these parts have carried on that tradition for generations.
Pleeeaaase, Da?
Da's real busy right now.
Besides, I don't have any wood. I'll make it later, all right?
Waaahhh!
Considering I've got time to kill, I can go get what you need.
Really? You mean it!?
Sure.
Yaaay!
Why would you offer to do that?
I'm a Watcher.
It's my duty to send the Lost on, Fallen or not.
You have my thanks.
What's an aegis tree look like, anyway?
Small, with red blossoms. You ought to be able to find one if you head north from here.
That was really sweet of you, Kagachi.
Not really. This is my job, after all.
I think there's more to it than that.
Less talking, more searching.
Well, if you're gonna be such a meanie about it!
And here I already spotted the tree, but if you don't want me to say anything—
Where?
Right there. Look.
How long were you gonna keep that to yourself?
Kagachi—someone's here.
Greetings, Lost one.
What regrets keep you here?
My children left me these flowers.
Did they?
You must be the mother of that little boy and girl we met.
Such a lovely smell.
Are you worried about your children?
They'll be all right. I know they'll grow up big and strong.
No, it's not them.
It's my father.
Because of what happened with his brother?
I'm certain that Uncle became one of the Fallen because he couldn't stop worrying about my father.
And now my father is wasting what's left of his life trying to fix it. I want this to end.
All right.
Makes it easy for me, if helping your father also helps you and your uncle to pass on in peace.
I can't thank you enough.
It's my duty as—
A Watcher?
*sigh*
He's back, he's back!
You found it!
Thank you.
Hey! You kinda smell like my mom!
Yeah, he does! He smells like Mommy!
No, that's just the flowers.
No, it's not that.
Not that!
It's like...like Mom is here, talking with us.
Yeah! It is!
Not much you can get past kids.
What do you mean?
I...I see. My wife really—?
You don't need to worry, I'll raise these two right.
You do sacred work, Watcher.
If you say so.
My father-in-law's not a young man.
I wish he'd stop putting himself in harm's way and just enjoy the years he's got left.
I'll try to make him see sense.
You'll probably find him where he always is, along the northwest slopes of Mt. Teora.
Right. I'll head that way.
It sounds so sad.
You could just finish it now, but then his brother would never forgive you.
What are you gonna do?
The old man said he could still hear his brother's voice.
So maybe there's some remnant of the bond they share, inside that creature.
It's a gamble I'm willing to take.
It'll pay off. I know it will.
There's someone waiting for you! I know you feel that!
You can't give in to despair until you've spoken to him!
Aaahhh... I...
He's talking!
Do you know who you are?
Yes, I... Bossa. My name is Bossa.
Kagachi, this is incredible! He's a person again!
Yeah. He's strong-willed, this one.
I...wish to see my brother.
Then come with me.
I knew you'd sense him.
Bossa... Is he...is he really here?
Brother...
I feel him beside me!
What the hell is going on? What did you do!?
Tell me!
He's here, all right. Worrying over you.
This is all my fault... I should have been the one to die, not him!
Don't say that. I'm glad you survived.
I couldn't bear to see you suffer as one of the Fallen. To know I had made you suffer even after death.
I'm sorry. I'm so sorry...
Heh, don't be so hard on yourself, Brother. It's stupid...
Stupid...
The longer you refuse to move on, the longer your brother will be in pain.
Your regrets do nothing but cause the dead to suffer. You owe it to them to find a way to be happy.
He's right, Brother. Enjoy life, for your own sake as well as mine.
Bossa... Out of all the little brothers in the world, I'm so glad you were mine.
As am I. I couldn't have asked for a better big brother.
Now that he knows you'll be all right, he's passed on.
I trust you know what you need to do.
I do. I took his words to heart.
Right.
I'm so happy for them.
It'd be great if everyone was able to talk to each other like that.
Life doesn't always give you what you want.
I know...
Still, miracles do happen.
Yeah. They do.
My brother and I owe you a great debt. Thank you.
You'll come visit, right?
Come visit!
You have a wonderful family, you know.
The best!
It must be nice having so many people who love you around. Kinda makes me jealous.
You could always stay.
No, I'm all right. Besides, I've already got someone who cares about me!
Oh yeah? Where?
You are SUCH a meanie!
You must be Kagachi.
That's me.
You're late. What kept you?
Sorry. It's a long story.
Lord Leo has authorized your visit. This way, please.
See that you don't get too close to the prisoners.
Oooh, is that who I THINK it is?
KA. GA. CHIII! How SWEET of you to come see me!
We need to talk.
DO we? What about, hmmm?
You said you heard the Night Devil's voice. Is that true?
Oh, yes. It was just the once, but it was SUBLIME.
It was INCREDIBLE!
What did it say to you?
Why? WHY do you want to know THAT?
I need to learn more about it if I'm going to stop it.
Aha... Hehe... HA HA HA HA HA!
You can't do that. You CAN'T!
I don't remember asking your opinion.
NO! It's IMPOSSIBLE.
I know. I know just how DEEP its darkness goes. It's a bottomless PIT!
Do you now?
Oooh, I DO.
When I killed. I felt something, for a second. I felt its THOUGHTS.
I didn't mean to. It was an ACCIDENT.
It wants to DESTROY this realm. It is full of such rage, and betrayal, and...
And DESPAIR.
Even in DEATH those thoughts linger on. No, they grow STRONGER than before!
Oh, I KNOW.
It's the embodiment of this realm's CORRUPTION.
The Night Devil is coming, Kagachi!
The NIGHT DEVIL! It's here! I can FEEL it!
Come!
Come! Cooome! COME! COME TO ME!
It's possessing him!
It's no different from a Daemon then, is it?
YEEESSS!
Wait... I...
Aaauuuggghhh!
The Night Devil's overwhelming him. The fool!
Is it over?
This is the Night Devil's soul.
I'm sorry I couldn't keep my promise. But there was no other way.
That much became clear during the fight. This thing is just too full of hatred.
There was no way your prayers would have reached it. It's beyond salvation.
You understand that, don't you?
I... Yes.
I understand.
I'm sorry.
I wish I could have saved you...
Kushi, what—
Kagachi... Can't let your guard down around this thing...
No—! Damn you!
Is it... Is it you? Kushi, is that you in there?
Heh...
Heh heh heh...
Not bad. Not bad at all.
Kushi, please! You have to fight it off!
Don't worry...
Why? Why are you doing this!?
I have to break it all. Every spirit of every person bound by the cycle.
Kagachi, you of all people understand. Don't you?
You understand just how rotten this realm really is. I hate it. I hate everything about this place.
Stop this. I don't want to fight you, Kushi!
Well...
Then you'll just have to watch this realm burn.
Make sure you keep your eyes open...
Or you'll miss what's about to happen.
No... The capital!
